chapters.title: Chapter 48: Near Avendesora
chapters.info: Malidra, p. 715—Eighteen year-old whom Aviendha becomes on her first step through the columns the second time through. She is scrawny enough to appear even younger than eighteen. She is the last of four sisters to survive—two were killed by heat and hunger, one died of a snakebite. She lives as a beggar and scavenger.
